Class Bindable<T>

Namespace
osu.Framework.Bindables
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

A generic implementation of a IBindable

public class Bindable<T> : IBindable<T>, IBindable, ICanBeDisabled, IHasDefaultValue, IUnbindable, IHasDescription, IFormattable, IParseable

Type Parameters

T

The type of our stored Value.

Constructors

Bindable(T)

Creates a new bindable instance initialised with a default value.

public Bindable(T defaultValue = default)

Parameters

defaultValue T

The initial and default value for this bindable.

Properties

BindTarget

An alias of BindTo(Bindable<T>) provided for use in object initializer scenarios. Passes the provided value as the foreign (more permanent) bindable.

public IBindable<T> BindTarget { set; }

Property Value

IBindable<T>

Bindings 

protected LockedWeakList<Bindable<T>> Bindings { get; }

Property Value

Default

The default value of this bindable. Used when calling SetDefault() or querying IsDefault.

public virtual T Default { get; set; }

Property Value

T

Description

The description for this object.

public string Description { get; set; }

Property Value

string

Disabled

Whether this bindable has been disabled. When disabled, attempting to change the Value will result in an InvalidOperationException.

public virtual bool Disabled { get; set; }

Property Value

bool

IsDefault

Check whether the current Value is equal to Default.

public virtual bool IsDefault { get; }

bool

Value

The current value of this bindable.

public virtual T Value { get; set; }

Property Value

T

Methods

BeginLease(bool)

Takes out a mutually exclusive lease on this bindable. During a lease, the bindable will be set to Disabled, but changes can still be applied via the LeasedBindable<T> returned by this call. You should end a lease by calling Return() when done.

public LeasedBindable<T> BeginLease(bool revertValueOnReturn)

Parameters

revertValueOnReturn bool

Whether the Value when BeginLease(bool) was called should be restored when the lease ends.

Returns

LeasedBindable<T>

A bindable with a lease.

BindDisabledChanged(Action<bool>, bool)

Bind an action to DisabledChanged with the option of running the bound action once immediately.

public void BindDisabledChanged(Action<bool> onChange, bool runOnceImmediately = false)

Parameters

onChange Action<bool>

The action to perform when Disabled changes.

runOnceImmediately bool

Whether the action provided in onChange should be run once immediately.

BindTo(Bindable<T>)

Binds this bindable to another such that bi-directional updates are propagated. This will adopt any values and value limitations of the bindable bound to.

public virtual void BindTo(Bindable<T> them)

Parameters

them Bindable<T>

The foreign bindable. This should always be the most permanent end of the bind (ie. a ConfigManager).

Exceptions

InvalidOperationException

Thrown when attempting to bind to an already bound object.

BindValueChanged(Action<ValueChangedEvent<T>>, bool)

Bind an action to ValueChanged with the option of running the bound action once immediately.

public void BindValueChanged(Action<ValueChangedEvent<T>> onChange, bool runOnceImmediately = false)

Parameters

onChange Action<ValueChangedEvent<T>>

The action to perform when Value changes.

runOnceImmediately bool

Whether the action provided in onChange should be run once immediately.

CopyTo(Bindable<T>)

Copies all values and value limitations of this bindable to another.

public virtual void CopyTo(Bindable<T> them)

Parameters

them Bindable<T>

The target to copy to.

CreateInstance()

Creates a new instance of this IBindable for use in GetBoundCopy(). The returned instance must have match the most derived type of the bindable class this method is implemented on.

protected virtual Bindable<T> CreateInstance()

Returns

Bindable<T>

GetBoundCopy()

Retrieve a new bindable instance weakly bound to the configuration backing. If you are further binding to events of a bindable retrieved using this method, ensure to hold a local reference.

public Bindable<T> GetBoundCopy()

Returns

Bindable<T>

A weakly bound copy of the specified bindable.

Exceptions

InvalidOperationException

Thrown when attempting to instantiate a copy bindable that's not matching the original's type.

GetUnboundCopy()

Create an unbound clone of this bindable.

public Bindable<T> GetUnboundCopy()

Returns

Bindable<T>

Parse(object, IFormatProvider)

Parse an object into this instance. An object deriving T can be parsed, or a string can be parsed if T is an enum type.

public virtual void Parse(object input, IFormatProvider provider)

Parameters

input object

The input which is to be parsed.

provider IFormatProvider

An object that provides culture-specific formatting information about input.

SetDefault()

Revert the current Value to the defined Default.

public void SetDefault()

ToString()

Returns a string that represents the current object.

public override sealed string ToString()

Returns

string

A string that represents the current object.

ToString(string, IFormatProvider)

Formats the value of the current instance using the specified format.

public virtual string ToString(string format, IFormatProvider formatProvider)

Parameters

format string

The format to use.

-or-

A null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) to use the default format defined for the type of the IFormattable implementation.

formatProvider IFormatProvider

The provider to use to format the value.

-or-

A null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.

Returns

string

The value of the current instance in the specified format.

TriggerChange()

Raise ValueChanged and DisabledChanged once, without any changes actually occurring. This does not propagate to any outward bound bindables.

public virtual void TriggerChange()

UnbindAll()

Calls UnbindEvents() and UnbindBindings(). Also returns any active lease.

public void UnbindAll()

UnbindBindings()

Remove all bound Bindable<T>s via GetBoundCopy() or BindTo(Bindable<T>).

public void UnbindBindings()

UnbindEvents()

Unbinds any actions bound to the value changed events.

public virtual void UnbindEvents()

UnbindFrom(IUnbindable)

Unbinds ourselves from another IBindable such that we stop receiving updates it. The other IBindable will also stop receiving any events from us.

public virtual void UnbindFrom(IUnbindable them)

Parameters

them IUnbindable

The other bindable.

Events

DefaultChanged

An event which is raised when Default has changed (or manually via TriggerDefaultChange(T, Bindable<T>, bool, bool)).

[CanBeNull]
public event Action<ValueChangedEvent<T>> DefaultChanged

Event Type

Action<ValueChangedEvent<T>>

DisabledChanged

An event which is raised when Disabled has changed (or manually via TriggerDisabledChange(Bindable<T>, bool, bool)).

[CanBeNull]
public event Action<bool> DisabledChanged

Event Type

Action<bool>

ValueChanged

An event which is raised when Value has changed (or manually via TriggerValueChange(T, Bindable<T>, bool, bool)).

[CanBeNull]
public event Action<ValueChangedEvent<T>> ValueChanged

Event Type

Action<ValueChangedEvent<T>>
